name: Assassin's Creed
description: The plot is set in a fictional history of real-world events, taking place primarily during the Third Crusade in the Holy Land in 1191.

name: Super Mario
description: A plumber named Mario and his brother Luigi travel through the Mushroom Kingdom to save the princess from the evil Bowser.

name: God of War
description: It began in 2005 on the PlayStation 2 video game console, and has become a flagship title for the PlayStation brand.

name: PUBG
description: PUBG: Battlegrounds is a battle royale game developed and published by PUBG Studios, a subsidiary of Krafton.

name: FIFA
description: FIFA is a series of association football video games developed and released annually by Electronic Arts.

name: Call of Duty
description: Call of Duty is a first-person shooter video game franchise published by Activision. Starting out in 2003, it first focused on games set in World War II.
